__e: Dean, your mom and dad, they still think of you as being a kid.
I told you that you were a good son, to let me take care of it.
Hey, your mom said that you were a kid, but you are almost as tall as me.
Have you ever been seen like you were a man?
- Don't pretend you're a human being.
Who are you to come to me and act like a father?
Hail Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with thee.
Hail Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with thee.
"Our Father, who art in Heaven, hallowed be Thy name..."
I want you to stop acting like you're the only one who lost her.
He'll pretend you're not there until you're not there.
I'm saying you're acting like you're better than us, and we don't like it.
This woman came here and just said that you, she said that you were dead.
I thought you'd died like all the others.
All those years, man, I thought you were dead... and it was my fault.
You think you're the first guy to have this idea?
I'm sorry I thought you were the murderer... but how was I to know he was as big a liar as you are?
Do you think you're the only person in the whole wide world that's lost a dog?
You can think of yourself like some kind of... accident.
I wouldn't have been so vulgar about it but, yes, that's the idea.
To keep from thinking that you're a screw-up... you blame me?
